name: Serenade - Romance Rules

location.name: Jane Mallett Theatre - St. Lawrence Centre for the Arts

description:
We are excited to welcome Italian guest conductor Giovanni Pompeo, and welcome back one of the orchestra's favourite piano soloists, Anya Alexeyev, to present a program of maximum Romantic melody. 

Anya stars as the soloist in an orchestral version of CÃ©sar Franck's luxurious Piano Quintet, and Maestro Pompeo will lead the orchestra in one of the most beloved Romantic works in the entire repertoire, Tchaikovsky's famous Serenade.
